elements.text: Your desk is cluttered, so you decide to organize it. When everything is out of the desk, you can't remember where each item goes. You do your best to place items back on the desk and, in the end, decide that it looks...

elements.name: Organizing your Desk_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
